title: SPY + John John Florence Signature Fold
description:
As a professional surfer, John John Florence has life on the road down pat: pack tight and travel light. JJF's signature Fold frame is multi-hinged and "folds" up to fit neatly its pouch or a pocket, without fear of getting lost or scratched.The FOLD sunglass is built from virtually indestructible Grilamid® and features a bridge hinge, 5-barrel hinges at the frame and temple, and mid-temple pin hinges for quick folding and stowing. Aloha.

http://www.spyoptic.com/
